author: PlayStation
description:
Crime doesn’t pay, but it doesn’t stop the bad guys from trying in this stand-alone follow-up to RoboCop: Rogue City. 

OCP’s latest project, OmniTower, a massive complex built for the residents of Old Detroit has been seized by a group of highly trained mercenaries who shoot first and ask questions… well never. 

RoboCop: Rogue City – Unfinished Business is coming to PlayStation 5 in Summer 2025.

author: PlayStation
description:
🏁  Discover Season 3 of TDUSC starting March 19! Enjoy two unique new game modes: Navigation Races & Convoy Missions, new cars, and numerous quality-of-life improvements!

Play Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown now.

TDUSC is a lifestyle and social experience that redefines the standards of open-world racing games. Alone or with friends, explore the island of Hong Kong,  accurately reproduced at 1:1 scale. Collect exceptional cars from dealerships, customize them in workshops, and showcase your style to reach the elite of the competition.
 
Experience the ultimate racing & lifestyle experience now on PS5!

#ps5 #ps5games #testdriveunlimitedsolarcrown
title: Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown - Season 3 Preview Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
2053. As the Earth's surface resources dwindle, powerful corporations turn to the uncharted depths of the oceans, unaware of the ancient horror they are about to awaken. You play Noah, and with the help of Key, your AI companion, you’re tasked to investigate the mysterious disappearance of miners in the depths of the Pacific Ocean. But beware: the deeper you descend, the more your mind succumbs to Cthulhu's relentless influence. Will you resist it?

Cthulhu: The Cosmic Abyss will be coming to PlayStation®5 in 2026. 

#ps5 #ps5games #cthulhu 

May contain content inappropriate for children. Visit http://www.esrb.org for rating information.
title: Cthulhu: The Cosmic Abyss - Reveal Trailer | PS5 Games

Hell is Us will be release on Sept 4, 2025 on Playstation 5.

author: PlayStation
description:
Styx is back! 

Master the art of stealth in Styx: Blades of Greed, the long-awaited third installment in the cult-classic series! Play as Styx, the cunning goblin thief, and lead your own crew in a high-stakes hunt for Quartz, a powerful resource at the heart of a looming war.

Outsmart the Inquisition with deadly skills.
Explore three vast, vertical open environments set in a dark fantasy universe.
Craft weapons and potions to execute the perfect heist.

Whether you're a longtime fan or new to the shadows, it's never been so thrilling to be greedy! 

Styx: Blades of Greed will be available on PlayStation®5 in Fall 2025.

May contain content inappropriate for children. Visit http://www.esrb.org for rating information.

#ps5 #ps5games #styx
title: Styx: Blades of Greed - Reveal Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
An unknown affliction spreads across Avaris, the Corrosion mutates everything it encounters into terrible abominations. The continent’s nomadic people do their best to celebrate life in a world where they can only await death. 

Explore this world as Eline, a Soul Whisperer, traveling with her companions, Ysoris and Kanta. However, it’s the discovery of a new power within her that may hold the key to ending the oncoming apocalypse. 

Edge of Memories will be coming to PlayStation 5 in Fall 2025. 

May contain content inappropriate for children. Visit http://www.esrb.org for rating information.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Edge of Memories - Gameplay Teaser Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10011091

Go Fight Fantastic! is a fast-paced, hand-drawn hack ‘n’ slash that combines action-packed gameplay with a unique character swap system. Players take control of a crew of interstellar smugglers, led by the space-dog Captain Bowie, as they fight to defend Bird Planet from an alien invasion.

With six-chapter Story Mode, players can experience the adventure solo or team up in 1-3 player co-op. The game features four distinct heroes—Tank, Healer, Striker, and Archer—each offering a different playstyle. Players will explore six diverse biomes, face challenging enemies, and take on epic bosses.

Beyond the story, Horde Mode provides an endless battle arena where players can test their skills. Randomized encounters and upgrade choices ensure that no two runs are ever the same.

Go Fight Fantastic! blends fast-paced combat, cooperative gameplay, and a beautifully hand-drawn world, making every battle a fresh and exciting experience.

#ps
title: Go Fight Fantastic - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

Once Upon a Puppet combines classic platforming with unique puppet-inspired gameplay. Set in a vibrant theatrical world, you'll control Nieve, a Stagehand exiled to the Understage, and Drev, a Puppet bound to her by magical strings. Together, they embark on a quest to return to the Frontstage, unraveling forgotten stories and uncovering shadowy secrets along the way.

author: PlayStation
description:
Join the party today: https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/synth-riders/

Synth Riders is now riding a wave of current hits for PlayStation VR2. Big talent and big songs are now available in Synth Riders Current Waves music pack, featuring popular tracks from David Guetta, SIA, Artemas, Charli XCX, and Jack Harlow!

Kluge Interactive is proud to deliver Synth Riders Current Waves, an essential collection of trending tracks, pulled from current popular playlists. The fan favorite VR rhythm game lets players ride the rails on five distinctive songs and feel the flow to modern hits.

🍎Apple - Charli XCX
⏱️I Don't Wanna Wait - David Guetta / One Republic
💌Gimme Love - SIA
💋i like the way you kiss me - Artemas
👀Lovin' On Me - Jack Harlow

#ps5 #psvr2games  #synthriders

author: PlayStation
description:
Split Fiction is a split-screen adventure tailored for two! Experience  boundary-pushing co-op gameplay where you’ll have to coordinate your actions and timing as well as work together to overcome challenges.  

Download Friend's Pass* to play Split Fiction with a friend for free on any platform (crossplay on PlayStation®, Xbox, and PC)! Try the early stages of the game in couch co-op or online cross-platform with another owner of the Friend’s Pass. If a friend owns the full game, you can join them for the entire adventure for free.

Pre-order Split Fiction now.

*Friend’s Pass requires installation of the Friend’s Pass and applicable platform account. Online play requires a friend on any platform. One user must own the full game in order for the co-op player to play the full game.

#ps5 #ps5games #splitfiction
title: Split Fiction - How to Invite a Friend for Free with the Friend's Pass | PS5 Games
